IdentityTrigger.name: Leaver
IdentityTrigger.Description: Disable all accounts when a user leaves.

IdentityTrigger.name: Reinstate
IdentityTrigger.Description: Re-enable all accounts when a user has been reinstated.

IdentityTrigger.name: Manager transfer
IdentityTrigger.Description: Disable all accounts when manager transfer occurs.

ServiceDefinition.name: FullText
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for refreshing full text indexes. The executionMode may be either "scheduled" or "automatic". The default if not specified is scheduled.
